## Database Design 

### Definitions
- Conceptual design:
  - Entity relatinoship model (ER model) is typically a conceptual design
  - Entities/attributes/relationships/constraints

- Definition 1, candidate key or a key of an entity set if it is both
  - Unique
  - Minimal: cannot delete any of the attribute without impariring 1
    - ID
    - email
    - name
    - dept_name
  
- Definition: Superkeys --> Further 

- Keys: 
  - Primary Key --> Unique
  - Example: ID of instructors/students --> uniqueness of information (underlined)
